statements: SELECT * FROM ShoppingLists;
SELECT meal_name, dietary_restriction FROM ShoppingLists;
SELECT id, meal_name FROM ShoppingLists WHERE dietary_restriction IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM ShoppingLists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, meal_name FROM ShoppingLists WHERE dietary_restriction = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM ShoppingLists WHERE dietary_restriction='Vegetarian' ORDER BY meal_name DESC;
SELECT id, meal_name FROM ShoppingLists WHERE dietary_restriction='Gluten-Free' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT dietary_restriction FROM ShoppingLists WHERE meal_name LIKE '%Pasta%';
SELECT * FROM ShoppingLists WHERE dietary_restriction='Vegetarian' AND meal_name='Salad';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_count FROM ShoppingLists WHERE dietary_restriction='Keto';
SELECT * FROM MealPlan;
SELECT meal_name, meal_date FROM MealPlan WHERE dietary_restriction = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT list_name, list_items FROM ShoppingList WHERE list_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM MealPlan ORDER BY meal_date DESC;
SELECT list_name FROM ShoppingList WHERE list_items->'fruits' @> '["apple", "banana"]';
SELECT * FROM MealPlan WHERE meal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY meal_name DESC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_date FROM MealPlan WHERE dietary_restriction = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY meal_date ASC;
SELECT list_id, list_name, list_date, jsonb_array_elements_text(list_items) AS item FROM ShoppingList WHERE list_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY list_date DESC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_description FROM MealPlan WHERE meal_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY meal_id;
SELECT * FROM MealPlan JOIN ShoppingList ON MealPlan.meal_date = ShoppingList.list_date WHERE MealPlan.dietary_restriction = 'Gluten-Free';
SELECT * FROM meal_plans ORDER BY date DESC, meal_name ASC
SELECT meal_name, ingredients FROM meal_plans WHERE dietary_restrictions='Vegetarian'
SELECT id, date FROM shopping_lists LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, preferred_meal FROM user_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions='Gluten-free'
SELECT meal_name, ingredients, date FROM meal_plans
SELECT * FROM meal_plans ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT meal_name, ingredients FROM meal_plans WHERE dietary_restrictions = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meal_plans FROM meal_plans;
SELECT meal_name, ingredients, dietary_restrictions FROM meal_plans WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, dietary_restrictions, preferred_meal FROM user_preferences JOIN meal_plans ON user_preferences.preferred_meal = meal_plans.meal_name ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM meal_plans;
SELECT meal_id, meal_name FROM meal_plans ORDER BY meal_id DESC;
SELECT list_name, list_items FROM shopping_lists WHERE list_id = 3;
SELECT restriction_name FROM dietary_restrictions WHERE restriction_id = 1;
SELECT meal_id, list_id FROM meal_list_relations WHERE meal_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM meal_plans;
SELECT meal_id, meal_name FROM meal_plans ORDER BY meal_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM shopping_lists WHERE list_name ILIKE '%breakfast%' ORDER BY list_id ASC;
SELECT m.meal_id, m.meal_name, s.list_name FROM meal_plans m INNER JOIN meal_list_relations mlr ON m.meal_id = mlr.meal_id INNER JOIN shopping_lists s ON mlr.list_id = s.list_id;
SELECT meal_name, COUNT(list_id) AS total_lists FROM meal_plans INNER JOIN meal_list_relations ON meal_plans.meal_id = meal_list_relations.meal_id GROUP BY meal_name HAVING COUNT(list_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM MealPlans;
SELECT meal_name, meal_date FROM MealPlans ORDER BY meal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Meals WHERE meal_category = 'Healthy' AND meal_type = 'Lunch';
SELECT meal_name, meal_category FROM Meals WHERE meal_type = 'Breakfast' ORDER BY meal_category ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_quantity FROM Ingredients WHERE ingredient_category = 'Protein';
SELECT meal_name, meal_description FROM MealPlans WHERE meal_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM Meals WHERE meal_category = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY meal_name DESC;
SELECT list_name, list_date FROM ShoppingLists WHERE list_complete = false;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_category, ingredient_quantity FROM Ingredients WHERE ingredient_quantity >= 10 ORDER BY ingredient_quantity ASC;
SELECT restriction_name, restriction_type FROM Restrictions WHERE restriction_type = 'Allergen'
